alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda; Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 10 at 2:27PM PDT until September 10 at 2:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM PDT FOR NORTHWESTERN NYE AND EAST CENTRAL ESMERALDA COUNTIES... At 227 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles east of Tonopah, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated and public observed. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs and trees. Reduced visibility due to blowing dust reported. Locations impacted include... Goldfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
